column4: looking for some help:  recently installed Gutsy on an IBM T43 -- everything has worked fine except for a problem where hotkeys seem 'sticky'.  I have a key combo bound for opening a gnome terminal and occasionally it will start opening an infinite amount of windows...
to stop it, I have to switch over to one of the non X terminals (alt-ctrl-F6, for instance) and killing all my processes.
I've been googling the issue and haven't found anything that seems to match up.  Weird stuff.
have you seen linux on laptops website? they might have something
